CustomField.description: Highest previous contribution from this account. Compares HPC Amount for all related contacts and grabs the largest. Calculated in Snowflake and pushed into Salesforce when there's a qualifying change.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Highest previous contribution. The largest received hard or soft credit ‘Close Amount’ for all contacts in this Account (excludes Planned Gift Opportunities)
CustomField.label: HPC Amount
